ref: 9070 phāṇita m.n. ʻ inspissated juice of sugarcane and other plants ʼ Āpast., phāṇi -- f. ʻ molasses, meal mixed with curds ʼ lex. [Pp. of phāṇayati2 ʻ skims ʼ Lāṭy. (caus. of *phaṇati2?); cf. phaṇá -- m. ʻ scum, froth ʼ TBr., phāṇṭá<-> ʻ filtered ʼ Ṛgvidh., n. ʻ first particle of butter in churning ʼ ŚBr. -- √*phaṇ2]
Pa. phāṇita -- n. ʻ sugarcane juice ʼ;
Si. päni ʻ juice of ripe fruit, spume of coconut toddy, molasses ʼ.
